name: Rumpelstiltskin Free
description:
Relive the magic of your childhood with the classic story of Rumpelstiltskin. Discover the moving picture book and a completely new take on storytelling. The vintage illustrations come to life with modern technology and take you through a series of games to complement the story.

Rumpelstiltskin boasts full interactivity combined with a stunning interface, clean and easy-to-read text, exceptional, moveable color illustrations, and stunning, professional sound — all designed to enhance the reading and learning experience for fairy tale fans of all ages.

*Vintage Illustrations by George Halkett and Fairytale Studios — Each image has been redrawn and professionally enhanced to optimize the storybook experience on your iOS device. The utmost care has been taken to preserve the magic of the original text and illustrations, while presenting them in a modern manner.

*Rumpelstilstkin’s School of Gold — Participate in a series of fun, interactive games along the way, all designed to complement the story and their learning experience. Delve further into the world of Rumpelstiltskin and attend Rumpelstiltskin’s School of Gold — a series of five games, teaching exactly how straw is grown, spun into gold, and stored inside the treasury.

*Illustrations Come To Life — Press the black and white images to bring them to life. Watch the characters turn to color and dance on the pages. This is truly special as George Halkett’s black and white images have never before been seen in color or motion.

*Fully Interactive — Explore hundreds of moving elements and sounds. Watch the storybook images fall, slide and collide.

*Stunning Sounds — Hundreds of sound snips and musical melodies have been professionally recorded and mastered to enhance the storytelling experience.

*Narration Options — Is mom or dad losing their voice? Or do they just need a break? Let one of three narrators present a unique reading experience. The Princess, the Prince, even the Fairy Godmother help develop phonological awareness, a key component of early literacy, as children are able to follow the text right along with the narrator’s voice.

* All Ages — Designed for ages three and up, but can be enjoyed by anyone young at heart.

* Universally Compatible — Read and play on your iPhone and iPad with no additional purchase necessary.

* Privacy Protection
We take online safety for children as a top priority and ensure that this app contains No personal UDID gathering, No social network integration, and No purchases required to continue playing. The app contains a "More Apps" section, with links to the App Store of our other titles. To make the app free for all users we have included ads by reputable agencies with no malicious content, we want the user to have the choice to have a free app with the option to remove all ads. We strongly encourage all users to take the option of ad removal so that the reading experience is as simple as reading a book off your very own bookshelf. We want to be very clear and have the option be in your hands!

Fairytale Studios is an industry leader in children’s interactive storybooks. Spark creative learning in your children, and relive the magic of your childhood, thanks to the enhanced vintage illustrations and incredible interactivity of classic stories presented to you on your modern devices.

Ideas for improvements? Contact us at customerservice@fairytale-studios.com
